item.title: history | Map Of Content
item.description: History How I see the History? There’s no year zero, as the Romans didn’t had the 0 in their numeric system

item.title: Middle Ages
item.description: Middle Ages The Middle Ages began with the fall of the [[Roman Empire]] in ==474== and finished in ==1492== with the [[Discover of America]] or the fall of [[Byzantine Empire]] in ==1453== - which happens to be the same date of the [[Invention of printing press - (Guttenberg)]] and the end of [[Hundred Years war]] (England - France )
